content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a command to write tests for the 'add_numbers' function and completed the task. The user requested that I use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to find hyperlinks related to their goals of exploration and learning. They provided a plan for reviewing the hyperlinks and reporting back with interesting resources or information. The command was provided with a specific URL. The result of the 'write_tests' command was returned and confirmed. I received a command to analyze a code for the 'fibonacci' function and added error handling to ensure that the input 'n' is a positive integer.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.nationalgeographic.com/", "question": "What are some interesting articles or resources related to exploration and learning on National Geographic?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a collection of articles, podcasts, and videos related to various topics such as travel, history, culture, and the environment, available on National Geographic's website. Some interesting resources include a guide to visiting Maine, a video on exploring Austin, Texas, and articles on shipwrecks discovered on an ancient sea route and the history of modern drag.\n\nLinks: [' (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/)', ' (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/search)', 'Newsletters (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/newsletters/signup)', 'Subscribe (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/subscribe)', 'Subscribe (https://magazines.nationalgeographic.com/subscribe/latest-stories)']", type='action_result')]
"""
